net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.api

Interface EntryUpdateVisitor

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CountingEntryUpdateVisitor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCountingEntryUpdateVisitor, CountingEntryUpdateVisitorCollector, CountingEntryUpdateVisitorDefault, EntryUpdateVisitorDummy

    public interface EntryUpdateVisitor
    This is the interface for a visitor that is notified about updates of entries.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void visitIndexedEntryUri(String uri, ChangeType changeType)
      This method is called for each resource during indexing of a SearchSource.

    • Method Detail

      • visitIndexedEntryUri

        void visitIndexedEntryUri(String uri,
                          ChangeType changeType)
        This method is called for each resource during indexing of a SearchSource. It allows to collect information for delta-indexing.
        Parameters:
        uri - is the URI of of the SearchEntry that is updated or remains untouched during indexing.
        changeType - indicates the change for the SearchEntry. Can also be null for no change.
        See Also:
        ResourceSearchIndexer.index(SearchIndexer, net.sf.mmm.util.resource.api.DataResource, ChangeType, net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.api.config.SearchIndexerDataLocation, EntryUpdateVisitor)
